data.title: Mass shootings by shooter’s race in the U.S. 2023
data.meta_description: Between 1982 and December 2023, 80 out of the 149 mass shootings in the United States were carried out by White shooters.
data.text:
Mass shootings in the U.S. by shooter’s by race/ethnicity as of December 2023

Published by Statista Research Department,

Number of mass shootings in the United States between 1982 and December 2023, by shooter's race or ethnicity

More information

Region

United States

Survey time period

1982 to December 6, 2023

Supplementary notes

Since 2013, the source defines a mass shooting as any single attack in a public place with three or more fatalities, in line with the definition by the FBI. Before 2013, a mass shooting was defined as any single attack in a public place with four or more fatalities.
